interval.title: Interval
interval.description: The interval of download job. minimum is 30 seconds.

title.title: Blog Title
title.description: The title of the blog. Only used for logging.

url.title: Blog RSS URL
url.description: RSS URL of the blog. Example: https://rss.blog.naver.com/[BlogID].xml

downloads.title: Downlads
downloads.description: The lists of blog posts/categories to download.

filterType.title: Filter Type
filterType.description: Filter type of download job. It must be "title" or "category".

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Search keyword. Downloader will search posts using this keyword.

destination.title: Download Destination
destination.description: Download destination. It should be entered as an full path.

downloaded.title: Downloaded Links
downloaded.description: Automatically generated by Downloader. At first, leave it as an empty array.
